author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: Looking for this Lupin LaserDisc...
body:
Does anyone on this list have this LD:
"Lupin the Third: The Castle of Caliostro [Eigoban]"
(Eigoban="English Version")? It was released in Japan
by Toho years ago, the disc's content includes the
Streamline Pictures dub of the film only. The analogue
track is a SFX/Music only track, allowing you to do
your own dub of the movie. The catalogue number for it
is TLL-2473. The disc cover is black and has the full
title in clear English letters and in small Japanese
print above it. If you have the disc I'm talking
about, please Email me directly, and give me a price
you're willing to sell for. We'll go from there....


=====
"Arsene Lupin III"
webmaster@lupinthethird.nospam.com
http://www.LupintheThird.com
